reviews.review_msg: Sabzehgar moved to San Diego State in Fall, 2014.  He is disorganized, and discourages questions by talking down to the students.  On our first midterm the average was 15 out of 60!

Best Prof ever. Well-organized, enthusiastic, and knows the materials very well. He posted all the dates for assignments, labs, quizzes, and exams from the first day of semester. He was flexible though to make some changes to the favor of class. Wonderful teaching style that I liked very much as he provides a summary of what he taught last session.

Alot of material in this course, classes are really boring, his voice puts u sleep at 830 classes. didnt show any interest in material himself, hard exams and quizes. Didnt learn much from this class.
His exams were  fair, and he is caring students by providing feedback. I loved his course.
The hardest part of the course is understanding his english. Useless going to his lectures. He is really boring and needs to work on his english ASAP!
I loved the easy way he conducted the complex materials.
